overview: Riyo, a law school graduate, is surprised to find Flora (Ola) by his side, when he wakes up. Ola is even more terrified and she thinks that she has been abducted and raped. In his office, Riyo meets Fauzan, Robin, and Fauzi, the brothers of Ola. Riyo denies that he slept with Ola, but they still beat him up. Matt Jago (Olaâ€™s father), a Betawi Mafia, is angry to hear that her daughter had sex with a stranger. He forces Riyo to marry Ola. The parents of Riyo are confused when they are suddenly asked to propose for Ola. Mercy, his girlfriend, is furious to hear that Riyo will get married to Ola. She finds Ola and accuses her of being a bitch. Ola does not care for she is determined to have Riyo.
title: The God Babe
